programme.title: The President will address the nation
programme.short_synopsis: President Clinton admits affair with Lewinsky to the grand jury and makes a TV apology.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Clinton makes a televised confession of his affair with Monica Lewinsky: Alistair Cooke considers its inadequacy and the betrayal of those who trusted and supported him.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
